content_not_support_audio: This movie has audio which is not supported by HaHaKaarFlix, please install VLC player to play audio.
update_content:
You cant update if you are using modded version. Please use official version on our homepage(yomee.me) to support developer.

Release Info
- Version: 2.3.0

- Size: 16.8MB

- Filelinked code: 30837432



Change logs

- Fix emergency bug app not loading.

- Add option to choose subtitle color.

- Add 5 link providers.

- Add option to choose watchlist, calendar and collection as default screen.

- Amazon Firestick, FireTV now can use menu button to add movie to watchlist.

- Fix text color and focus color on some devices.
description_player: Best player to work with HaHaKaarFLix. Less ads and better streaming!
